lines.text: I don't remember programming you to be so full of crap.
Kid... think to yourself... why did you create me?
Except for when we have to go up against that guy, I NEVER wanna see you again!
Well, if it isn't that Cold-Steel Kid as I live and breathe, which - son of a gun - I am!
Sugar is his weakness because... he is a dentist. Gee, really creative, Gus.
No, no, no... he's not a dentist. He's an orthodontist. The one that put braces on me when I was a teenager.
Well, Gus, you have a beautiful smile. You should be thanking this guy. Not making him into one of your bad guys.
Kid, I don't like your attitude!
[Lauren storms into the room obviously upset]
Is anything... oh, how should I put this... Wrong?
